mapper.update:
/* 대국민포털_DUR효능군중복품목기본 수정 (DurEftgrpItemMapper.updateDurEftgrpItem) */ UPDATE kids_own.TB_PP_M_DUR_EFTGRP_ITEM SET mdcn_cd = coalesce(#{mdcnCd}, mdcn_cd) ,eft_group = coalesce(#{eftGroup}, eft_group) ,group = coalesce(#{group}, group) ,group_1 = coalesce(#{group1}, group_1) ,eftgrp_dpcn_chck_cd = coalesce(#{eftgrpDpcnChckCd}, eftgrp_dpcn_chck_cd) ,gnrl_nm_cd = coalesce(#{gnrlNmCd}, gnrl_nm_cd) ,gnrl_nm = coalesce(#{gnrlNm}, gnrl_nm) ,item_nm = coalesce(#{itemNm}, item_nm) ,bzenty_nm = coalesce(#{bzentyNm}, bzenty_nm) ,mfds_prdct_nm = coalesce(#{mfdsPrdctNm}, mfds_prdct_nm) ,mfds_igrd_cd = coalesce(#{mfdsIgrdCd}, mfds_igrd_cd) ,mfds_igrd_nm = coalesce(#{mfdsIgrdNm}, mfds_igrd_nm) ,pbanc_ymd = coalesce(#{pbancYmd}, pbanc_ymd) ,pbanc_no = coalesce(#{pbancNo}, pbanc_no) ,aplcn_ym = coalesce(#{aplcnYm}, aplcn_ym) ,mdfr_id = coalesce(#{mdfrId}, mdfr_id) ,mdfcn_dt = now()
WHERE 1=1 AND eftgrp_dpcn_sn = #{eftgrpDpcnSn}
